title: Login button not responding on mobile
description: Users cannot log in on mobile devices - button appears but does not respond to taps

title: Dashboard charts not loading
description: Charts on the main dashboard fail to load, showing blank spaces

title: Email notifications not sending
description: Email notifications are not being sent to users after account creation

title: Search results showing duplicates
description: Search functionality returns duplicate results for the same items

title: Payment processing timeout
description: Payment processing times out after 30 seconds, causing failed transactions

title: Profile image upload failing
description: Users cannot upload profile images - upload progress bar gets stuck

title: API rate limiting too strict
description: API rate limiting is preventing legitimate users from accessing the service

title: Dark mode toggle not working
description: Dark mode toggle button exists but does not change the theme

title: Database connection pool exhausted
description: Database connection pool is being exhausted, causing service degradation

title: Mobile responsive layout broken
description: Layout breaks on mobile devices with screens smaller than 375px

title: File upload size validation missing
description: No validation for file upload sizes, allowing users to upload massive files

title: User session timeout too short
description: User sessions expire too quickly, requiring frequent re-login
